Uses of Interface
mireka.login.LoginSpecification

  • Packages that use LoginSpecification 
    Package Description
    mireka.login
    Contains classes for the configuration and verification of login credentials.
    mireka.pop
    Contains classes for the configuration and connection handling of a POP3 (Post Office Protocol) server.
    mireka.submission
    Filters and configuration objects related to receiving mail from a MUA (Mail User Agent).

    • Uses of LoginSpecification in mireka.login

      Classes in mireka.login that implement LoginSpecification 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GlobalUsersLoginSpecification
      This class authenticates users of a GlobalUsers collection using different authentication algorithms corresponding to both SMTP and POP3 protocols.
